metadata.title: CVE-2022-0496 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerbiility was found in Openscad, where a DXF-format drawing withparticular (not necessarily malformed!) properties may cause anout-of-bounds memory access when imported using import().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0496` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openscad - 2021.01-5
openscad-testing - 2021.01-5
openscad-testing-data - 2021.01-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openscad package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2021.01-5').
